::: {.column width="70%"}
The ***identity function*** is also simple. 
Whatever is the input will become the output, that is, the output is *identical to the input*. The graph of the identity function is a straight line going through $(0,0)$ with slope 1.
:::


::: {.column width="5%"}
:::

The output of the identity function is simply the input value.
